concept.title: Kudu
concept.shortdesc: The Kudu destination writes data to a Kudu cluster.

conbody.p: Kudu destinationoverviewdestinationsKuduWhen you configure the Kudu destination, you specify the connection information for one or more Kudu masters, define the table to use, and optionally define field mappings. By default, the destination writes field data to columns with matching names.
If the destination receives a change data capture log from some origin systems, you must select the format of the change log.
You can also configure the external consistency mode and the operation timeout for the destination.
